data.prayer: Father, help the 1,598 believers in Jutiapa to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Jutiapa, Guatemala
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Jutiapa that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 4 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 1,598 believers living in Jutiapa, Guatemala.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.prayer: God, guide the 1,598 believers in Jutiapa to multiply spiritual families that love you, love each other, and make disciples.
Lord we ask you on behalf of the Jew, Spanish-speaking people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 1,598 believers in Jutiapa, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 1,598 believers in Jutiapa that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.section_summary:
the state of Jutiapa, Guatemala has a population of 6,400.

We estimate Jutiapa has 1,598 people who might know Jesus, 4,502 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 301 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 1,598 believers in the state of Jutiapa to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.
